description:
I was excited to have Isaac back. He's such an awesome bottom!
He was excited to be back as well.
"I always have a lot of fun when I'm here," he said. "I always look forward to it."
As Isaac mentions in the video, he loves guys with dark hair. So he really liked Gabe!
I think he really liked getting fucked by him, too, because his dick was hard the whole time...
And check out the big, messy facial Gabe gave to Issac!!
title: Gabe & Isaac
